greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = a(2) = 0, for n>=3: (sum of non-divisors of n) modulo (number of non-divisors of n).
comment: a(n) = 0 for n = 1, 2 and numbers from A140826.
a(n) = 1 for numbers of form 2*p (p=prime) from A100484 and other numbers, e.g. 8 and 13456 are only numbers n < 10^5 which are not of form 2*p with a(n) = 1.
link: Jaroslav Krizek, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _Jaroslav Krizek_, Nov 07 2013
